eXo WCM is a fully integrated Content Management solution inside GateIn.
Basically, extension mechanism is used inside GateIn to add content features. If you want more information about the extension mechanism, you can read the GateIn documentation:
[http://docs.jboss.com/gatein/portal/3.1.0-FINAL/reference-guide/en-US/html/index.html]

This integrated solution provides users with a comprehensive platform for integrating applications and managing and publishing content - all from a single, familiar console.

When starting a new project, you can see eXo WCM as a WCM Java developer Platform. With guidelines provided in this reference guide, you can build stable applications using eXo WCM from the inside.
